name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: I Just Want the Recipe Janet

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: I don't need the whole backstory, I just want to make some eggplant carbonara.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever wanted to skip the marital problems and jump straight to the cookie recipe on your favorite food blog? This extension detects recipes and will prompt you with a button which replaces everything on the page with just the recipe.
